YIFI, first of all, thank you for sharing, and I like many others appreciate your hard work with all this and other movies.

But it must be said that these movies are compressed so heavily and thus pixelated and marred by motion artifacts and blurring, that it is not suited for movie buffs and archivists, but rather for people who have low speed internet access.

Just saying.

Dear YIFY,
 Can you please do the ROCKY movies, all of 'em???

As someone knew to PB and torrents, I wanna thank you for what you do. Im getting ready to deploy to Afghanistan and enjoy your uploads. 

Cheers!
Mike
